<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8"?><record_update table="sys_script_fix">
    <sys_script_fix action="INSERT_OR_UPDATE">
        <before>false</before>
        <description>Move fulfillment instructions out of the HR Service table, into its own table.</description>
        <name>Move Fulfillment Instructions To Table</name>
        <record_for_rollback>false</record_for_rollback>
        <script><![CDATA[MoveFulfillmentInstructionsToOwnTable();

// Loop through set of services, finding ones that have fulfillment
// instructions embedded into them
function MoveFulfillmentInstructionsToOwnTable() {
	var service = new GlideRecord("sn_hr_core_service");
	if (service.isValidField('kb_articles')) {
		service.addEncodedQuery('fulfillment_instructionsISNOTEMPTY^ORkb_articlesISNOTEMPTY');	
		service.query();
		while(service.next()) 
			addNewFulfillmentInstruction(service);
	}
}

// Create a new fulfillment_instruction in new table from service source
function addNewFulfillmentInstruction(service) {
	var fi = new GlideRecord("sn_hr_core_fulfillment_instructions");
	fi.initialize();
	fi.setValue('active', 'true');
	fi.setValue('name', service.getValue('name'));
	fi.setValue('instructions', service.getValue('fulfillment_instructions'));
	fi.setValue('kb_articles', service.getValue('kb_articles'));
	fi.setValue('table', service.getValue('service_table'));
	fi.setValue('condition', 'hr_service=' + service.getUniqueValue() + '^EQ');
	fi.insert();
}]]></script>
